title: Women Take Lead in Wellness Investing
itunes:title: Women Take Lead in Wellness Investing
description:
Ellie Rubenstein, Co-Founder and CEO of Manna Tree, discusses her female led private equity firm that invests in companies that improve human health through nutrition.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
